apt-get install -d X: You get no further than that?
when i upgraded to 10.04, shit go messed up
and so i went and tried reinstalling xserver
Reboot your machine.  Get to the GRUB menu.
When you're in the grub menu, enter "e" -- and then "e" again when you've navigated to the kernel-line.
Add a "3" to the end of the line you see.
which line is the kernel one?
This will boot you into runlevel 3, which is no-GUI w/ Networking.
so what should that line look like?
Doesn't matter.  You're just adding a "3" to the end of it.
